name: United Kingdom

typical_paths.label: UK regimes (informational)
bullets: High-level mapping of AIFM perimeter and marketing considerations; depends on manager type and investors.
NPPR and any approvals/notifications must be confirmed with counsel and FCA guidance.

marketing_notes: UK financial promotions rules are strict; marketing materials and targeting require review.
Distribution to retail investors generally increases requirements materially.
requires_counsel_triggers: Any financial promotions / marketing to UK persons.
Any retail distribution or promotions to non-professional investors.
Any use of exemptions without FCA-aligned review.
